47 namespace collision_detection
48 {
49 static const std::string NAME = "FCL";
50 constexpr char LOGNAME[] = "collision_detection.fcl";
51 
52 namespace
53 {
54 // Check whether this FCL version supports the requested computations
55 void checkFCLCapabilities(const DistanceRequest& req)
56 {
57 #if MOVEIT_FCL_VERSION < FCL_VERSION_CHECK(0, 6, 0)
58  if (req.enable_nearest_points)
59  {
60  // Known issues:
61  // https://github.com/flexible-collision-library/fcl/issues/171,
62  // https://github.com/flexible-collision-library/fcl/pull/288
63  ROS_ERROR_THROTTLE_NAMED(2.0, LOGNAME,
64  "You requested a distance check with enable_nearest_points=true, "
65  "but the FCL version MoveIt was compiled against (%d.%d.%d) "
66  "is known to return bogus nearest points. Please update your FCL "
67  "to at least 0.6.0.",
68  FCL_MAJOR_VERSION, FCL_MINOR_VERSION, FCL_PATCH_VERSION);
69  }
70 #endif
71 }
72 } // namespace
73 
74 CollisionEnvFCL::CollisionEnvFCL(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& model, double padding, double scale)
75  : CollisionEnv(model, padding, scale)
76 {
77  const std::vector<const moveit::core::LinkModel*>& links = robot_model_->getLinkModelsWithCollisionGeometry();
78  std::size_t index;
79  robot_geoms_.resize(robot_model_->getLinkGeometryCount());
80  robot_fcl_objs_.resize(robot_model_->getLinkGeometryCount());
81  // we keep the same order of objects as what RobotState *::getLinkState() returns
82  for (auto link : links)
83  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < link->getShapes().size(); ++j)
84  {
85  FCLGeometryConstPtr link_geometry = createCollisionGeometry(link->getShapes()[j], getLinkScale(link->getName()),
86  getLinkPadding(link->getName()), link, j);
87  if (link_geometry)
88  {
89  index = link->getFirstCollisionBodyTransformIndex() + j;
90  robot_geoms_[index] = link_geometry;
91 
92  // Need to store the FCL object so the AABB does not get recreated every time.
93  // Every time this object is created, g->computeLocalAABB() is called which is
94  // very expensive and should only be calculated once. To update the AABB, use the
95  // collObj->setTransform and then call collObj->computeAABB() to transform the AABB.
96  robot_fcl_objs_[index] =
97  FCLCollisionObjectConstPtr(new fcl::CollisionObjectd(link_geometry->collision_geometry_));
98  }
99  else
100  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unable to construct collision geometry for link '%s'", link->getName().c_str());
101  }
102 
103  manager_ = std::make_unique<fcl::DynamicAABBTreeCollisionManagerd>();
104 
105  // request notifications about changes to new world
106  observer_handle_ = getWorld()->addObserver(boost::bind(&CollisionEnvFCL::notifyObjectChange, this, _1, _2));
107 }
108 
109 CollisionEnvFCL::CollisionEnvFCL(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& model, const WorldPtr& world, double padding,
110  double scale)
111  : CollisionEnv(model, world, padding, scale)
112 {
113  const std::vector<const moveit::core::LinkModel*>& links = robot_model_->getLinkModelsWithCollisionGeometry();
114  std::size_t index;
115  robot_geoms_.resize(robot_model_->getLinkGeometryCount());
116  robot_fcl_objs_.resize(robot_model_->getLinkGeometryCount());
117  // we keep the same order of objects as what RobotState *::getLinkState() returns
118  for (auto link : links)
119  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < link->getShapes().size(); ++j)
120  {
121  FCLGeometryConstPtr g = createCollisionGeometry(link->getShapes()[j], getLinkScale(link->getName()),
122  getLinkPadding(link->getName()), link, j);
123  if (g)
124  {
125  index = link->getFirstCollisionBodyTransformIndex() + j;
126  robot_geoms_[index] = g;
127 
128  // Need to store the FCL object so the AABB does not get recreated every time.
129  // Every time this object is created, g->computeLocalAABB() is called which is
130  // very expensive and should only be calculated once. To update the AABB, use the
131  // collObj->setTransform and then call collObj->computeAABB() to transform the AABB.
132  robot_fcl_objs_[index] = FCLCollisionObjectConstPtr(new fcl::CollisionObjectd(g->collision_geometry_));
133  }
134  else
135  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unable to construct collision geometry for link '%s'", link->getName().c_str());
136  }
137 
138  manager_ = std::make_unique<fcl::DynamicAABBTreeCollisionManagerd>();
139 
140  // request notifications about changes to new world
141  observer_handle_ = getWorld()->addObserver(boost::bind(&CollisionEnvFCL::notifyObjectChange, this, _1, _2));
142  getWorld()->notifyObserverAllObjects(observer_handle_, World::CREATE);
143 }
144 
145 CollisionEnvFCL::~CollisionEnvFCL()
146 {
147  getWorld()->removeObserver(observer_handle_);
148 }
149 
150 CollisionEnvFCL::CollisionEnvFCL(const CollisionEnvFCL& other, const WorldPtr& world) : CollisionEnv(other, world)
151 {
152  robot_geoms_ = other.robot_geoms_;
153  robot_fcl_objs_ = other.robot_fcl_objs_;
154 
155  manager_ = std::make_unique<fcl::DynamicAABBTreeCollisionManagerd>();
156 
157  fcl_objs_ = other.fcl_objs_;
158  for (auto& fcl_obj : fcl_objs_)
159  fcl_obj.second.registerTo(manager_.get());
160  // manager_->update();
161 
162  // request notifications about changes to new world
163  observer_handle_ = getWorld()->addObserver(boost::bind(&CollisionEnvFCL::notifyObjectChange, this, _1, _2));
164 }
165 
166 void CollisionEnvFCL::getAttachedBodyObjects(const moveit::core::AttachedBody* ab,
167  std::vector<FCLGeometryConstPtr>& geoms) const
168 {
169  const std::vector<shapes::ShapeConstPtr>& shapes = ab->getShapes();
170  const size_t num_shapes = shapes.size();
171  geoms.reserve(num_shapes);
172  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < num_shapes; ++i)
173  {
174  FCLGeometryConstPtr co = createCollisionGeometry(shapes[i], getLinkScale(ab->getAttachedLinkName()),
175  getLinkPadding(ab->getAttachedLinkName()), ab, i);
176  if (co)
177  geoms.push_back(co);
178  }
179 }
180 
181 void CollisionEnvFCL::constructFCLObjectWorld(const World::Object* obj, FCLObject& fcl_obj) const
182 {
183  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < obj->shapes_.size(); ++i)
184  {
185  FCLGeometryConstPtr g = createCollisionGeometry(obj->shapes_[i], obj);
186  if (g)
187  {
188  auto co = new fcl::CollisionObjectd(g->collision_geometry_, transform2fcl(obj->global_shape_poses_[i]));
189  fcl_obj.collision_objects_.push_back(FCLCollisionObjectPtr(co));
190  fcl_obj.collision_geometry_.push_back(g);
191  }
192  }
193 }
194 
195 void CollisionEnvFCL::constructFCLObjectRobot(const moveit::core::RobotState& state, FCLObject& fcl_obj) const
196 {
197  fcl_obj.collision_objects_.reserve(robot_geoms_.size());
198  fcl::Transform3d fcl_tf;
199 
200  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < robot_geoms_.size(); ++i)
201  if (robot_geoms_[i] && robot_geoms_[i]->collision_geometry_)
202  {
203  transform2fcl(state.getCollisionBodyTransform(robot_geoms_[i]->collision_geometry_data_->ptr.link,
204  robot_geoms_[i]->collision_geometry_data_->shape_index),
205  fcl_tf);
206  auto coll_obj = new fcl::CollisionObjectd(*robot_fcl_objs_[i]);
207  coll_obj->setTransform(fcl_tf);
208  coll_obj->computeAABB();
209  fcl_obj.collision_objects_.push_back(FCLCollisionObjectPtr(coll_obj));
210  }
211 
212  // TODO: Implement a method for caching fcl::CollisionObject's for moveit::core::AttachedBody's
213  std::vector<const moveit::core::AttachedBody*> ab;
214  state.getAttachedBodies(ab);
215  for (auto& body : ab)
216  {
217  std::vector<FCLGeometryConstPtr> objs;
218  getAttachedBodyObjects(body, objs);
219  const EigenSTL::vector_Isometry3d& ab_t = body->getGlobalCollisionBodyTransforms();
220  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < objs.size(); ++k)
221  if (objs[k]->collision_geometry_)
222  {
223  transform2fcl(ab_t[k], fcl_tf);
224  fcl_obj.collision_objects_.push_back(
225  std::make_shared<fcl::CollisionObjectd>(objs[k]->collision_geometry_, fcl_tf));
226  // we copy the shared ptr to the CollisionGeometryData, as this is not stored by the class itself,
227  // and would be destroyed when objs goes out of scope.
228  fcl_obj.collision_geometry_.push_back(objs[k]);
229  }
230  }
231 }
232 
233 void CollisionEnvFCL::allocSelfCollisionBroadPhase(const moveit::core::RobotState& state, FCLManager& manager) const
234 {
235  manager.manager_ = std::make_unique<fcl::DynamicAABBTreeCollisionManagerd>();
236 
237  constructFCLObjectRobot(state, manager.object_);
238  manager.object_.registerTo(manager.manager_.get());
239 }
240 
241 void CollisionEnvFCL::checkSelfCollision(const CollisionRequest& req, CollisionResult& res,
242  const moveit::core::RobotState& state) const
243 {
244  checkSelfCollisionHelper(req, res, state, nullptr);
245 }
246 
247 void CollisionEnvFCL::checkSelfCollision(const CollisionRequest& req, CollisionResult& res,
248  const moveit::core::RobotState& state, const AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm) const
249 {
250  checkSelfCollisionHelper(req, res, state, &acm);
251 }
252 
253 void CollisionEnvFCL::checkSelfCollisionHelper(const CollisionRequest& req, CollisionResult& res,
254  const moveit::core::RobotState& state,
255  const AllowedCollisionMatrix* acm) const
256 {
257  FCLManager manager;
258  allocSelfCollisionBroadPhase(state, manager);
259  CollisionData cd(&req, &res, acm);
260  cd.enableGroup(getRobotModel());
261  manager.manager_->collide(&cd, &collisionCallback);
262  if (req.distance)
263  {
264  DistanceRequest dreq;
265  DistanceResult dres;
266 
267  dreq.group_name = req.group_name;
268  dreq.acm = acm;
269  dreq.enableGroup(getRobotModel());
270  distanceSelf(dreq, dres, state);
271  res.distance = dres.minimum_distance.distance;
272  }
273 }
274 
275 void CollisionEnvFCL::checkRobotCollision(const CollisionRequest& req, CollisionResult& res,
276  const moveit::core::RobotState& state) const
277 {
278  checkRobotCollisionHelper(req, res, state, nullptr);
279 }

288 void CollisionEnvFCL::checkRobotCollision(const CollisionRequest& req, CollisionResult& res,

290  const moveit::core::RobotState& state2) const

292  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Continuous collision not implemented");

294 
295 void CollisionEnvFCL::checkRobotCollision(const CollisionRequest& req, CollisionResult& res,
296  const moveit::core::RobotState& state1,
297  const moveit::core::RobotState& state2,
298  const AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm) const
299 {
300  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Not implemented");
301 }
302 
303 void CollisionEnvFCL::checkRobotCollisionHelper(const CollisionRequest& req, CollisionResult& res,
304  const moveit::core::RobotState& state,
305  const AllowedCollisionMatrix* acm) const
306 {
307  FCLObject fcl_obj;
308  constructFCLObjectRobot(state, fcl_obj);
309 
310  CollisionData cd(&req, &res, acm);
311  cd.enableGroup(getRobotModel());
312  for (std::size_t i = 0; !cd.done_ && i < fcl_obj.collision_objects_.size(); ++i)
313  manager_->collide(fcl_obj.collision_objects_[i].get(), &cd, &collisionCallback);
314 
315  if (req.distance)
316  {
317  DistanceRequest dreq;
318  DistanceResult dres;
319 
320  dreq.group_name = req.group_name;
321  dreq.acm = acm;
322  dreq.enableGroup(getRobotModel());
323  distanceRobot(dreq, dres, state);
324  res.distance = dres.minimum_distance.distance;
325  }
326 }
327 
328 void CollisionEnvFCL::distanceSelf(const DistanceRequest& req, DistanceResult& res,
329  const moveit::core::RobotState& state) const
330 {
331  checkFCLCapabilities(req);
332 
333  FCLManager manager;
334  allocSelfCollisionBroadPhase(state, manager);
335  DistanceData drd(&req, &res);
336 
337  manager.manager_->distance(&drd, &distanceCallback);
338 }
339 
340 void CollisionEnvFCL::distanceRobot(const DistanceRequest& req, DistanceResult& res,
341  const moveit::core::RobotState& state) const
342 {
343  checkFCLCapabilities(req);
344 
345  FCLObject fcl_obj;
346  constructFCLObjectRobot(state, fcl_obj);
347 
348  DistanceData drd(&req, &res);
349  for (std::size_t i = 0; !drd.done && i < fcl_obj.collision_objects_.size(); ++i)
350  manager_->distance(fcl_obj.collision_objects_[i].get(), &drd, &distanceCallback);
351 }
352 
353 void CollisionEnvFCL::updateFCLObject(const std::string& id)
354 {
355  // remove FCL objects that correspond to this object
356  auto jt = fcl_objs_.find(id);
357  if (jt != fcl_objs_.end())
358  {
359  jt->second.unregisterFrom(manager_.get());
360  jt->second.clear();
361  }
362 
363  // check to see if we have this object
364  auto it = getWorld()->find(id);
365  if (it != getWorld()->end())
366  {
367  // construct FCL objects that correspond to this object
368  if (jt != fcl_objs_.end())
369  {
370  constructFCLObjectWorld(it->second.get(), jt->second);
371  jt->second.registerTo(manager_.get());
372  }
373  else
374  {
375  constructFCLObjectWorld(it->second.get(), fcl_objs_[id]);
376  fcl_objs_[id].registerTo(manager_.get());
377  }
378  }
379  else
380  {
381  if (jt != fcl_objs_.end())
382  fcl_objs_.erase(jt);
383  }
384 
385  // manager_->update();
386 }
387 
388 void CollisionEnvFCL::setWorld(const WorldPtr& world)
389 {
390  if (world == getWorld())
391  return;
392 
393  // turn off notifications about old world
394  getWorld()->removeObserver(observer_handle_);
395 
396  // clear out objects from old world
397  manager_->clear();
398  fcl_objs_.clear();
399  cleanCollisionGeometryCache();
400 
401  CollisionEnv::setWorld(world);
402 
403  // request notifications about changes to new world
404  observer_handle_ = getWorld()->addObserver(boost::bind(&CollisionEnvFCL::notifyObjectChange, this, _1, _2));
405 
406  // get notifications any objects already in the new world
407  getWorld()->notifyObserverAllObjects(observer_handle_, World::CREATE);
408 }
409 
410 void CollisionEnvFCL::notifyObjectChange(const ObjectConstPtr& obj, World::Action action)
411 {
412  if (action == World::DESTROY)
413  {
414  auto it = fcl_objs_.find(obj->id_);
415  if (it != fcl_objs_.end())
416  {
417  it->second.unregisterFrom(manager_.get());
418  it->second.clear();
419  fcl_objs_.erase(it);
420  }
421  cleanCollisionGeometryCache();
422  }
423  else
424  {
425  updateFCLObject(obj->id_);
426  if (action & (World::DESTROY | World::REMOVE_SHAPE))
427  cleanCollisionGeometryCache();
428  }
429 }
430 
431 void CollisionEnvFCL::updatedPaddingOrScaling(const std::vector<std::string>& links)
432 {
433  std::size_t index;
434  for (const auto& link : links)
435  {
436  const moveit::core::LinkModel* lmodel = robot_model_->getLinkModel(link);
437  if (lmodel)
438  {
439  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < lmodel->getShapes().size(); ++j)
440  {
441  FCLGeometryConstPtr g = createCollisionGeometry(lmodel->getShapes()[j], getLinkScale(lmodel->getName()),
442  getLinkPadding(lmodel->getName()), lmodel, j);
443  if (g)
444  {
445  index = lmodel->getFirstCollisionBodyTransformIndex() + j;
446  robot_geoms_[index] = g;
447  robot_fcl_objs_[index] = FCLCollisionObjectConstPtr(new fcl::CollisionObjectd(g->collision_geometry_));
448  }
449  }
450  }
451  else
452  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Updating padding or scaling for unknown link: '%s'", link.c_str());
453  }
454 }
455 
456 const std::string& CollisionDetectorAllocatorFCL::getName() const
457 {
458  return NAME;
459 }
